alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Manatee, Hillsborough and Sarasota Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 630 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Plant City to 7 miles east of Greater Sun Center to 7 miles east of Lakewood Ranch. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Sarasota, Bradenton, Plant City, Temple Terrace, Palmetto, Fish Hawk, Brandon, Lutz, Hillsborough River State Park, Greater Sun Center, South Gate Ridge, Lake Sarasota, Saint Armands Key, North Sarasota, Palm River-Clair Mel, Memphis, East Lake-Orient Park, West Samoset and Southgate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota
